approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on the IT team for retrieving recordings.
Improve efficiency in accessing and downloading recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT team to provide recordings stored on the NFS server. This process is manual and time-consuming. This project aims to automate and streamline the process of accessing and downloading V-KYC recordings for audit and other requirements.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal should be provided to the leads of VKYC process (TL & Process Manager).
All recordings of V-KYC shall be made available on this portal.
Recordings should be fetched as and when required.
Recordings should be searchable by LAN ID.
Recordings should be available date, month wise.
Users should be able to upload a file (Excel or text) with a list of LAN IDs (max 50) for bulk download.
The system should process the uploaded file and trigger a call to backend API.
Results of the bulk download request should be displayed in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
The table should have pagination displaying only 10 records at a time.
Only 10 records should be downloaded at a time during bulk download.
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders)

functional_requirements: Date and month-wise filtering of recordings.
Bulk download functionality via file upload (CSV/TXT).
Display of recording details in a tabular format.
Download All option for bulk downloads.
Pagination for displaying and downloading records.
non_functional_requirements: The system should be accessible only to authorized users (Team Leads).
Performance: The system should handle the bulk download requests efficiently.
success_criteria: V-KYC recordings are easily accessible to authorized users.
The time taken to retrieve recordings is reduced.
The dependency on the IT team is minimized.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
File upload should be csv/txt file.
File will contain min 2 and maxmium 50 LanIDs
assumptions: The existing infrastructure (NFS server, network) will be available and functional.
The backend API for processing the bulk download request will be available.
risks: Network issues could impact access to the NFS server.
